column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This place has a pretty corporate vibe
column2: and the coffee was just kind of meh. My son loved the hot chocolate there
column3: though. My german pastry was above average. The little tarlets looked beautiful but we did not try them. An okay place
column4: but surely there are better options in a place as big as Houston. We tried three different coffee shops and really didn't love any of them. Weird. San Antonio has better coffee. Sorry Houston.
